docs.snippet: Coming on the heels of a divisive political election, the American Music Awards on Sunday night in Los Angeles became a platform for strong, and sometimes foul, political language. Here's a look at some of the top moments from the American Music A...
docs.lead_paragraph: Coming on the heels of a divisive political election, the American Music Awards on Sunday night in Los Angeles became a platform for strong, and sometimes foul, political language. Here's a look at some of the top moments from the American Music Awards show:

headline.main: Strong, Sometimes Foul Political Language Marks the AMAs
headline.print_headline: Strong, Sometimes Foul Political Language Marks the AMAs

docs.snippet: Saying nothing is beyond the reach of God's mercy, Pope Francis told Catholics worldwide he is allowing all priests to absolve the faithful of abortion — women and health workers alike — even while stressing that it is a grave sin in t...
docs.lead_paragraph: Saying nothing is beyond the reach of God's mercy, Pope Francis told Catholics worldwide he is allowing all priests to absolve the faithful of abortion — women and health workers alike — even while stressing that it is a grave sin in the eyes of the church to "end an innocent life."

headline.main: Pope Allows All Priests to Absolve 'Grave Sin' of Abortion
headline.print_headline: Pope Allows All Priests to Absolve 'Grave Sin' of Abortion
